DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to assess the safety and tolerability of AZD2516 following administration of a single dose.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics After Single Doses of AZD2516 to Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy white males or nonfertile females between 20 to 45 years and 65 to 80 years old. Weight between 50 to 100 kg and a body mass index (BMI) between 19 to 28 kg/m2 History of previous or ongoing psychiatric disease. Abnormalities in ECG that may interfere with interpretation of data.
